scripts.prep:mainnet: mustache networks/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen;
scripts.prep:rinkeby: mustache networks/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen;
scripts.prep:ropsten: mustache networks/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen;
scripts.deploy:testnet: yarn prep:rinkeby; graph deploy digitalax/digitalaxropsten --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prep:mainnet; graph deploy digitalax/digitalax --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
